meanings.definition: A large and busy city where people from many different countries live and work.
meanings.sent1: In the cosmopolis, you can hear languages from all over the world.
meanings.sent2: New York City is often described as a cosmopolis due to its diverse population.
meanings.sent3: The cosmopolis was so bustling that even the pigeons seemed to speak different languages.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a cosmopolis of thoughts, each one coming from a different corner of her experiences.
meanings.sent5: The cosmopolis was a melting pot of cultures, blending together in a vibrant tapestry.

meanings.definition: A city or community that is inclusive and welcoming to people from all over the world.
meanings.sent1: The small town transformed into a cosmopolis as people from various nations settled there.
meanings.sent2: The cosmopolis embraced newcomers with open arms, celebrating diversity.
meanings.sent3: Even the local bakery in the cosmopolis offered pastries from around the globe.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was a cosmopolis of emotions, each one finding a home in its inclusive embrace.
meanings.sent5: The cosmopolis was a beacon of unity, where differences were celebrated and cherished.
